item.title: Invincible Ledgedash
item.description: Why Ledgedash? Copied link! First, what is a ledgedash? Ledgedashing is teching the corner of the stage wall after a hit and quickly wavelanding onto stage while you still have invincibility. Ledgedashing can be a useful tool for recovery and a possible reversal when being edgeguarded, and we’ve seen it become increasingly prominent in Rivals’ meta over the past few years. Download the WEBM or MP4 video. How To Copied link!
